ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running python3 telesetup.py locally or https://repl.it/@Anmol10H/Lightning-Userbot#main.py online.

CUSTOM_PMPERMIT.description: The message that appears when someone PM's you. Leave it as such for default message.
CUSTOM_PMPERMIT.value: Do not spam here, else you will be blocked automatically.

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your Github Access Token for gitcommit plugin.Google 'Github access token' to find.

CMD_HNDLR.description: Used to invoke commands, leave as it for default

SUDO_HNDLR.description: Used to invoke sudo commands, leave blank for default

GIT_REPO_NAME.description: Your repo name Example: Anmol-dot284/Lightning, but GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN must be setup first.

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: Needed for Lydia AI. Create a Intellivoid Account by visting https://coffeehouse.intellivoid.info/ to get your API.

PRIVATE_GROUP_BOT_API_ID.description: create a private channel and then type .get_id add that value here for save messages

PM_PERMIT_GROUP_ID.description: Put an Group Id Same As PRIVATE_GROUP_ID Required For Pmpermit plugin.

PM_LOGGR_BOT_API_ID.description: for login private messages create a private channel and do .get_id and add that id

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

ALIVE_MSG.description: Set Custom awake Message When entering .awake command.

CHROME_BIN.description: Leave as such, Google Chrome (or) Chromium binary location for selenium based modules.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: Leave as such, ChromeDriver location for selenium based modules

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: Channel Where You Save Your Plugins

SUDO_USERS.description: Users you want to give access to your bot. (Don't allow unknown people)

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: Same value as PRIVATE_GROUP_BOT_API_ID. Must read https://telegra.ph/userbot-Setup-06-06 for knowing how to get the value. Required for pmpermit.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the token of your bot. Get it else .help won't work.

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the username of your bot. Needed for .help to work.

TG_GRUP.description: Telegram Grup Name Starts With @ like, @lightningsupport, If No Name Leave It Default. Required For Alive

TG_CHANNEL.description: Telegram Channel  Starts With @ like @blacklightningot, If No Channel Leave It Default. Required For Alive

SPAM.description: Number of messages one can send in your PM before being approved. By default, it is 5.

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: Required for OCR functionality. Get from https://ocr.space/ocrapi

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: Required for Removing image background functionality. Get from https://www.remove.bg/

ALIVE_PIC.description: telegra.ph link to theimage you want as alive pic, leave blank for sticker

PMPERMIT_PIC.description: telegra.ph link to theimage you want as pmpermit pic, leave blank for default one!

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time on autopic/get time. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc
